about_the_game:
Sex monsters - the DLC name is already speaking of itself. It includes very cool sex monsters, dozens undressable male and female monsters ready for having sex in your game. Some of them are naked and some are partially dressed, but you can remove all their clothes. Using different settings, you can create perfect sex monsters and manage them according to your wishes. You will use them as main character and give them orders where they should go and what they have to do. You will decide with whom they will have sex today.

All monsters have working genitals with a lot of different settings. Also, you can change the size of body, make it thin or thick, make an athletic or huge, manage the erection of penis on male characters and set up female's vaginas, clitoris and anuses, boob's size according to your needs.

Try those cool sex monsters one by one to see which one you like most of all.

Just imagine how cool it could be.

You will get:

Arcturian
Chimp female
Chimp male
Cyclops
Demon
Exo alien female
Exo alien male
Foxxy
Gimple
Gnom female
Gnom male

You can use all characters from Sex monsters DLC as main character

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the Play mode you replace main character on scene.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC characters are completely naked and have working genitals.

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Sex monsters for Cyberpunk sex - additional very cool customizable male and female monsters of different kinds and sizes ready for having sex in your game
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
